name: aeo-skill-marketplace
description: Curated collection of AI development skills for Claude Code and compatible agents

plugins.name: aeo-claude
plugins.description: Claude development skills: Agent SDK reference, skill creation, slash command creation, and Opus prompting techniques

plugins.name: aeo-agile-tools
plugins.description: Specialized agents for agile methodology support including sprint facilitation, backlog management, requirements analysis, and delivery coordination

plugins.name: aeo-architecture
plugins.description: Design and documentation toolkit with agents for creating system architectures, C4 diagrams, ADRs, and conducting quality analysis

plugins.name: aeo-code-analysis
plugins.description: Tools for examining legacy codebases, assessing technical debt, evaluating technology options, and documenting undocumented systems

plugins.name: aeo-deployment
plugins.description: Release management agents for orchestrating deployments, ensuring compliance, and implementing progressive rollout strategies

plugins.name: aeo-documentation
plugins.description: Documentation suite implementing the Diataxis framework with dedicated agents for tutorials, how-to guides, explanations, and reference materials

plugins.name: aeo-epcc-workflow
plugins.description: Structured development methodology agents supporting the Explore-Plan-Code-Commit cycle from initial discovery through final delivery

plugins.name: aeo-performance
plugins.description: Performance engineering toolkit with agents for profiling, bottleneck identification, optimization planning, and monitoring setup

plugins.name: aeo-requirements
plugins.description: Requirements gathering agents for product discovery, technical specifications, stakeholder interviews, and build-vs-buy analysis

plugins.name: aeo-security
plugins.description: Security assessment agents for vulnerability scanning, compliance validation, code auditing, and remediation guidance

plugins.name: aeo-tdd-workflow
plugins.description: Test-driven development agents enforcing red-green-refactor methodology with comprehensive test generation and quality validation

plugins.name: aeo-testing
plugins.description: Quality assurance agents for test planning, automated validation, quality gate enforcement, and coverage analysis

plugins.name: aeo-troubleshooting
plugins.description: Systematic debugging agents with structured problem-solving workflows and collaborative escalation mechanisms

plugins.name: aeo-ux-design
plugins.description: User experience agents for interface optimization, accessibility validation, and WCAG compliance verification

plugins.name: aeo-python
plugins.description: Python development skills covering CLI engineering, data pipelines, and terminal UI development with Textual

plugins.name: aeo-n8n
plugins.description: Comprehensive n8n workflow automation skills including expressions, node configuration, code nodes, and MCP integration

plugins.name: aeo-nous
plugins.description: Self-improving context system: extracts learnings and knowledge from sessions, injects them at startup, monitors context usage with statusline
